name: Big Sky
description:
Our company is only as good as our people who dedicate and commit themselves to deliver quality customer service and by 'truly' caring about your clients and your calls. Each call, every call, and all of our clients deserve, demand, and receive this care. THIS is our goal, this is what we strive for and this is what Big Sky Call Centers has consistently delivered for the past 15 years.
Our industry leading state-of-the-art systems insure that your calls are delivered to us without fail 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Plus, and an industry first, we have agents that can work off premises in the event we require them to do so. This insures that call spikes and unexpected increases in call volume potentially due to weather or other issues are handled quickly by our remote agents.
